q: What is the Pauper Deck Library?
a: This site is a curated list of Pauper decks based on the Magic Online card pool. I always thought the MTGO interface wasn't very helpful for browsing decks, especially when you have a large number. I built this mostly for myself so apologies if it's not super polished.
Prices are calculated using data from Scryfall. The cheapest reprint found for each card is used for the calculation.

q: When are the decks or deck prices updated?
a: I'll try to update prices regularly. Decklists are added or updated whenever I get around to it and under no specific schedule.
I currently play exclusively in Magic Online, thus all decks are based on the MTGO card pool.

q: Can I contribute to the website?
a: Sure. Use the form on the Suggest Decklist link to suggest new decks or updates to existing decklists. I'll update the site as soon as possible.

q: How do I get in touch?
a: If you have a comment, suggestion or would like to report a bug feel free to message me via Reddit.

All card info and card images obtained from Scryfall. Site was built using ReactJS and Bootstrap. The main libraries used where: React Infinite Scroller, React Bootstrap, React Router and Recharts. It is hosted on Github Pages.
